title: What are the best zoom alternatives in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Zoom is one of the fastest-growing video conferencing app. It combines simple online meetings, video conferencing, and group messaging into an easy-to-use platform. The solution is designed to deliver audio, video, and screen-sharing experience across devices. It offers some unique features such as it supports up to 1000 interactive video participants and can cater for up to 10,000 view-only partakers. As the solution is designed to help businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment. In the current situation(Covid19 pandemic) there are millions of people who are using Zoom as a video and teleconferencing app, as the majority of the businesses and teams have switched to remote work as staying safe is the first priority. Along with the benefit, people are doubtful about Zoom’s privacy issues even before the COVID-19 pandemic as the app has been sharing users’ data with other services like Facebook and LinkedIn. Due to this drawback, the companies and teams are looking for Zoom’s alternative. Thankfully there are some good Zoom alternatives available in the market, that can help you and your business to overcome the security and privacy issue. Here I am mentioning a few of them: uShare: It is a web-based team collaboration app that empowers its users to create dedicated chatrooms, collaborates via text, audio, and video conference, shares and receives files, and more. To put it simply, it’s a combination of Zoom and Slack with powerful third-party integrations.Skype: It is a telecommunications app that provides video chat and voice calls and instant messaging services.Microsoft Teams: It is a chat-based workspace that enables users to collaborate along with features like video conference and file storage.Google Hangouts: It allows you to create, schedule, and host video conferences with other users. The app includes features such as Screen sharing and easy calendar integration for easy scheduling.As there are several Zoom alternatives app available which can help you in communicating and collaborating with your team & clients. But each app has its own pros and cons which make them unique from one another. So in order to choose the best you can go through their description given. I hope you find this helpful.
